name: Woodruff and the Schnibble of Azimuth
name_original: Woodruff and the Schnibble of Azimuth
description:
Woodruff and the Schnibble of Azimuth is an adventure game developed by Coktel Vision. It was originally released in 1995. Sierra On-Line published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Woodruff and the Schnibble of Azimuth is available on PC.
